summary: This API is used for the seller to upload the proof of delivery file for a package, and to generate the URL of the corresponding file
description:
This API is used for the seller to upload the proof of delivery file for a package, and to generate the URL of the corresponding file. The generated URL is used for the Update Package Delivery Status API.   This API only supports uploading qualification files in PDF format. The file size can not exceed 10MB.  Note: Only sellers utilizing the SOF (Seller Own Fleet) capability can use this API.  Version
202309
  
API Testing Tool

query.description: Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response.  Get by API Get Authorization Shop
Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.
Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.
Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

header.description: The seller access_token value from Get Access Token, when user_type = 0. Follow this guide to get seller access_token.

body.description: PDF file data to be uploaded to TikTok Shop.  Prerequisites： - Only PDF file format is supported. - Original file size must not exceed 10MB.
The name of the uploaded file. The file name must include the file type.

schema.description: The success or failure status code returned in API response.
The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

children.description: The URL returned from uploading the file that can be directly opened in a browser.

error_codes.message: Invalid upload file. Please ensure you are passing the correct file data.
Invalid file type. Please ensure you are providing a PDF file.
Invalid file size. Please ensure your file is smaller than 10MB.
